commands.condition: If within 7 spaces of any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the most damaged hostile figure, then {ACTION} Attack the most damaged hostile figure.

commands.condition: If no hostile figure within 7 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of a hostile figure, then {ACTION} Move within 5 spaces of a hostile figure.

commands.condition: If adjacent to any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the most damaged hostile figure, then {ACTION} Move towards the nearest friendly figure.

commands.condition: If within 2 spaces of friendly target that is not within attack range of a target (adjacent for melee, 2 spaces for reach, 4 spaces for range)
commands.command: {ACTION} Use Order ability on that friendly figure to have it move within attack range of the nearest hostile figure.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the most damaged hostile figure, then {ACTION} Move towards {PRIORITY_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 4 spaces
commands.command: {ACTION} Move towards the nearest friendly figure.

commands.condition: Reaction - If defending while adjacent to a friendly figure
commands.command: Use Cower ability if a rolled dice does not cancel anything.

commands.condition: If within 4 spaces of any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the most damaged hostile figure, then {ACTION} Move towards {PRIORITY_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 5 spaces of any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of the nearest hostile figure, then {ACTION} Attack that figure, then move towards {PRIORITY_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 5 spaces
Reaction - At the end of the round, if adjacent to a Rebel figure with 2 or less Health left, and not adjacent to any friendly figures
If within 4 spaces of any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Attack the most damaged hostile figure, then {ACTION} Move towards {PRIORITY_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If within 6 spaces of any hostile figure
commands.command: {ACTION} Move within 4 spaces of the nearest hostile figure, then {ACTION} Attack that figure, then move towards {PRIORITY_TARGET}.

commands.condition: If no hostile figures within 6 spaces
Reaction - If adjacent to another friendly Trooper while attacking
commands.command: If accuracy check is successful, use Squad Training ability to reroll a {SURGE}.
